sobre-mi.explicacion-sobre-mi:
My name is Fabrizio Julian Casanova.
I am a Full StackWeb Developer born in Vicente Lopez, Argentina.
I am passionate about programming and all that it entails.
Currently it is very difficult not to be dependent on a program that makes our work easier. Whether it is the operating system, the programs that come with it, or the web programming, everything ends up being beneficial to the world.

My objective is to develop my professional career in the IT world as part of a company that allows me to grow professionally and in turn apply everything I have learned so far to its benefit.
